wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Salmon (born 1994) is a Welsh international lawn and Indoor bowler.

link_mentions.page: Lawn bowls at the Commonwealth Games

response: He was selected as part of the Welsh team for the 2018 Commonwealth Games on the Gold Coast in Queensland where he claimed a gold medal in the Pairs with Daniel Salmon.
|  Emma Boyd  Daniel Salmon  Mark O'Hagan

link_mentions.page: List of Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls

response: In 2017, he reached the final of the open pairs during the 2017 World Indoor Bowls Championship with his playing partner Daniel Salmon
